title: [LFM][Silver - Gold][Team Retribution]
body:
Hello!
I'm currently recruiting for my Discord and my team!
I'm Looking for people that are in **Silver And Gold**
That means Flex rank must be now lower than **Silver V** And No Higher Than **Gold III**
Looking into my team, I'd like you to at least know this much about your **Role**

> _**READ THIS**_

**Top**>I Expect you to know how to pressure and win your lane, understand** roaming**, and CSing And Your Matchups And own **EVERY** Champion for top lane (maybe shotcall?)
**Jungle**> I Expect the jungler to know when the gank, pressure, farm, **(30 Farm at 10 Minutes isn't acceptable)** Picking phase and matchups and have every champion for this role(maybe shotcall?)
**ADC**>I Expect the ADC to know his matchups, play the meta, know positioning, and for HeavenSake **DON'T SPLIT PUSH** and Have every champion for this role (maybe shotcall?)
**Support**I expect the support to know how to support live, breathe, and eat support. that means you can play **BOTH** And have every champion for this role (maybe shotcall?)
>_** GO BACK UP AND READ THIS**_

> **_Answer This_**

Age?:

Champ Pool?:

Current rank(Solo/Duo)?:

Current rank(Flex)?:

Role you're trying to fill?:

Time zone? (PST/CST/EST):

What times are you available?:

Are you dedicated?:

> **_Must Own Discord_**

Discord: https://discord.gg/tMgkSRA

Good luck! And cash me on rift summoners how bou dat
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

> [{quoted}](name=ScorchOne23,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=rAgngirb,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-02-25T23:53:57.482+0000)
>
> Age?: 18
> 
> Champ Pool?: Cailyn, Ashe, Jhin, Lucian, Kalista, Jinx, Tristana, Ezreal, Sivir, Varus, Corki, Miss Fortune, Vayne
> 
> Current rank(Solo/Duo)?: Bronze 1 65 LP, Last season was Gold 5
> 
> Current rank(Flex)?: Unranked in Flex, only know one other person who plays league seriously so it's always solo/duo que for me
> 
> Role you're trying to fill?: ADC
> 
> Time zone? (PST/CST/EST): EST
> 
> What times are you available?: All day on weekends, After 8pm on Mondays, not available until 10pm on Tuesdays, Wednesdays after 1pm, All day Thursdays, Fridays after 1pm
> 
> Are you dedicated?: Absolutely. I've been playing a lot of mid this season but I have over two years of experience at purely ADC and two more years before that as a support.  I can also shotcall if needed and am always on top of meta strategies and the current best picks/bans.  I also stream constantly on twitch and will accept criticism. I'm aware my current rank is a bit low but all I can ask is that you give me a try and judge me off of that.

Edit: I do in fact own discord and use it constantly as my main voice comms.
